Master SQL Injection Techniques

Welcome to the most comprehensive SQL injection testing laboratory. Practice ethical hacking techniques in a controlled environment with progressively challenging vulnerability scenarios.

Start Level 1

Educational Purpose Only

This laboratory is designed for educational and authorized penetration testing purposes only. Do not use these techniques on systems you do not own or have explicit permission to test. Unauthorized access to computer systems is illegal and unethical.

Vulnerability Levels

Level 1Beginner

Basic String Injection

Simple SQL injection using string concatenation. Learn the fundamentals of how SQL injection works.

String-based SQL Injection

3 hints availableClick to start ‚Üí
Level 2Beginner

Numeric Injection

SQL injection in numeric fields without quotes. Understand how numeric contexts can be exploited.

Numeric SQL Injection

3 hints availableClick to start ‚Üí
Level 3Intermediate

Union-based Injection

Extract data using UNION SELECT statements. Learn advanced data extraction techniques.

Union-based SQL Injection

3 hints availableClick to start ‚Üí
Level 4Intermediate

Blind Boolean Injection

Extract data when no direct output is visible. Master inference-based attacks.

Blind SQL Injection

3 hints availableClick to start ‚Üí
Level 5Advanced

Time-based Blind Injection

Use time delays to extract information. Learn stealth data extraction methods.

Time-based Blind SQL Injection

3 hints availableClick to start ‚Üí
Level 6Advanced

Second-order Injection

Exploit stored data that gets executed later. Understand persistent injection attacks.

Second-order SQL Injection

3 hints availableClick to start ‚Üí
Level 7Expert

Error-based Injection

Extract data through database error messages. Learn information disclosure techniques.

Error-based SQL Injection

3 hints availableClick to start ‚Üí
Level 8Expert

Advanced Filter Bypass

Bypass WAFs and input filters. Master evasion techniques and advanced payloads.

Filter Evasion

Maximum Protection Implementation

Experience a completely secure implementation that demonstrates industry best practices. This level is immune to all SQL injection attacks and shows how to properly defend against vulnerabilities while maintaining functionality.
